definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The doctors tell me that's what has knocked my digestion out being so infernally jealous of her.
sentences.chinese: 医生们说我消化不良就是因为我对她嫉妒得太厉害啦。

sentences.english: Drinking potato juice every day can ease indigestion, a new study has found.
sentences.chinese: 一项新的调查，每天喝土豆汁可以消化不良的症状。

sentences.english: Gord . Heartburn is a form of indigestion.
sentences.chinese: 心是一种形式的消化不良。

sentences.english: Poor digestion can be caused by defective mastication of the food in the mouth.
sentences.chinese: 消化不良可能是由于嘴里的食物没有充分咀嚼的缘故。

sentences.english: U. S. A's tharm is not so long that it will get indigestion when it swallows Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 美国的肠子没有那么长，吞进伊拉克，会消化不良。

sentences.english: Now if we have indigestion,it's very difficult to enjoy food.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们消化不良，那很难享受美食。

sentences.english: Indigestion is a common result of improper food combining.
sentences.chinese: 不适当的食物组合导致的共同结果是消化不良。

sentences.english: I overate at the party last night and got violent indigestion.
sentences.chinese: 我今天晚上吃多了，消化不良。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effect of Banxiaxiexin decoction combined with Mosapride tablets in treating functional dyspepsia.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察中西医结合治疗功能性消化不良的疗效。

sentences.english: L ast week, I went to a dinner party that gave me a bout of indigestion.
sentences.chinese: 上周我去参加了一个晚宴，结果害得我消化不良。

sentences.english: A dyspeptic Sarlacc regurgitates the hunter onto the desert sands.
sentences.chinese: 一只消化不良的沙拉克把猎人吐回到荒漠。

sentences.english: I feel within me the manifest prognostics of indigestion.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉到我肚子里有明显的消化不良症候。

sentences.english: Finally, it is possible that your symptoms may be caused by functional dyspepsia.
sentences.chinese: 另外，你的症状也有可能是由功能性消化不良引起的。

sentences.english: Asking by has the help very much regarding the affable dyspepsia.
sentences.chinese: 对于舒缓消化不良的问以很有帮助。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy of electroacupuncture plus TDP for treating functional dyspepsia.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察电针加TDP治疗功能性消化不良的疗效。

definition: (of food) to retain in stomach due to indigestion (TCM)
